comment.author: 85469550@N00
comment._content: Anyone know the story of this moon backdrop?  I've seen several pics with it, including one of my grandpa, from the St. Louis area.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content:
Dear ohairas
The couple would have been photographed at Luna Park, a fun park modelled on the Coney Island type. There was usually a photographic studio as part of the park, anything to make extra money.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment._content: I love this photograph, it´s so beautiful and romantic!

comment._content: I have a similar setting for a relative from Blayney, NSW, Australia. It may have been taken locally or in a studio in Sydney or even Luna Park.
